Package controllers

Class TrendViewController

java.lang.Object
controllers.TrendViewController
public class TrendViewController extends Object
Controller for the Trend view. Builds X report and Z report.

  • Constructor Summary

    Switches the scene to the order history screen.
    void
    makeXReport()
    Generates the hourly X report for 11am – 12am and updates the UI labels.
    void
    makeZReport()
    Generates the daily Z report for the current day and updates the front end If a Z report already exists for today, no new report is created.

      public TrendViewController()

  • Method Details

    • makeXReport

      public void makeXReport()
      Generates the hourly X report for 11am – 12am and updates the UI labels. shows hour's metrics to the X report table.

    • makeZReport

      public void makeZReport()
      Generates the daily Z report for the current day and updates the front end If a Z report already exists for today, no new report is created.

    • goToCheckout

      public void goToCheckout(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Switches the scene to the checkout screen.
      Parameters:
      event - The ActionEvent triggered by pressing the checkout button.
      Throws:
      IOException - if the FXML file cannot be loaded.
